      Base-64 decode a sequence of bytes into the given ByteStringBuilder, starting from the given offset, using the standard scheme and the given alphabet.

      Base-64 decode a sequence of bytes into the given ByteStringBuilder, starting from the given offset, using the standard scheme and the standard alphabet.

      Base-64 decode a sequence of bytes into the given ByteStringBuilder, starting from the given offset, using the standard scheme and the standard alphabet.
      static void Base64.base64Encode(ByteStringBuilder target, ByteArrayInputStream src, char[] alphabet, boolean doPadding)
      Base-64 encode a sequence of bytes into the given ByteStringBuilder using the standard scheme and the given alphabet.
      static void Base64.base64Encode(ByteStringBuilder target, int a, char[] alphabet)
      Base-64 encode a single byte with the given alphabet and append the resulting character to the given ByteStringBuilder.
      static void Base64.base64EncodeStandard(ByteStringBuilder target, ByteArrayInputStream src, boolean doPadding)
      Base-64 encode a sequence of bytes into the given ByteStringBuilder using the standard scheme and the standard alphabet and optionally include padding characters at the end of the encoded result.
